sword.name: Mighty Sword
sword.description: A mighty Sword, so sharp it can cut through chese.

effects.message: With a deep breath, you raise the Mighty Sword. As you charge, the blade ignites in radiant light. The Dragon roars, lunging toward you—but with a single, precise strike, you plunge the sword deep into its heart. A deafening cry fills the chamber before silence falls…, You have slain the Dragon.

dragon.message: You try to spank the dragon with the Wooden Sword and the dragon just seems to enjoy it and with a sneeze his fire consumes you. You are dead.

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: A mighty Dragon with a breath of wildfire

chest.name: Chest
chest.description: A wooden old chest with a crack in it.

open.message: You open the chest and inside you see something brown it looks like a piece of wood. With further examination you see that it's a Wooden Sword. You take the Sword...

attack.message: You attack the chest, chest is still locked.

exits.locked_description: You try to open it but to no avail, the door is locked but you see a rusty keyhole. Maybe there is something you can fit in it.

key.open_description: You put in the key and it fits perfectly, you turn it around and slowly open the wooden door. It creaks worse than your hungry stomach.
